tool_description: product item and search for taobao.com tmall.com 1688.com alibaba.com
name: Taobao Product API
title: Taobao Product API

api_list.name: Item Detail from taobao/1688
api_list.description:
Get item detail by item id
use 2 provider only taobao / 1688
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://taobao-product-api.p.rapidapi.com/item/taobao/1234567890"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "taobao-product-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://taobao-product-api.p.rapidapi.com/item/{provider}/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "taobao-product-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Search Results from taobao / 1688 / alibaba
api_list.description:
Search results by keyword from Taobao / 1688 / Alibaba
use 3 provider taobao / 1688 / alibaba
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://taobao-product-api.p.rapidapi.com/search/taobao/adidas/1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "taobao-product-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://taobao-product-api.p.rapidapi.com/search/{provider}/{keyword}/{page}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "taobao-product-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
